title: Bedřich Hamsa
text: Bedřich Hamsa (born 25 October 1965) is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> former <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He played in the <a href="Czechoslovak%20First%20League">Czechoslovak First League</a> for <a href="SK%20Slavia%20Prague">Slavia Prague</a> and <a href="Bohemians%201905">Bohemians Prague</a>. Hamsa later played for <a href="FK%20Drnovice">Drnovice</a> in the <a href="Czech%20First%20League">Czech First League</a>, scoring four times in 26 matches in its inaugural season. He was top goal scorer in the <a href="1994%E2%80%9395%20Czech%202.%20Liga">1994–95 Czech 2. Liga</a>, scoring 22 goals for <a href="FC%20LeRK%20Brno">LeRK Brno</a> that season. He subsequently played in the <a href="Czech%202.%20Liga">Czech 2. Liga</a> for <a href="FK%20Teplice">Teplice</a> and <a href="FK%20GGS%20Arma%20%C3%9Ast%C3%AD%20nad%20Labem">Ústí nad Labem</a>.
